articles.author: NAJIB JOBAIN, SAMY MAGDY and CARA ANNA
articles.description: RAFAH, Gaza Strip (AP) — Israel’s neighbors and key mediators warned Saturday of disaster and repercussions if its military launches a ground invasion in Gaza’s southern city of Rafah, where Israel says remaining Hamas strongholds are located — along with over half the besieged territory’s population.
articles.title: Gaza mediators and others warn Israel of disaster if it launches a ground invasion on crowded Rafah

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.description: JERUSALEM (AP) — The sound of gunfire crackled over the phone as the teenage girl hid in the car and spoke. An Israeli tank was near the vehicle as she and her family were trying to heed Israel’s call to evacuate their home in Gaza.
articles.title: 'They are shooting at us.' A fleeing Gaza family is killed along with the medics sent to find them

articles.author: JILL COLVIN
articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — Republican front-runner Donald Trump said Saturday that, as president, he warned NATO allies that he “would encourage” Russia “to do whatever the hell they want” to countries that are “delinquent” as he ramped up his attacks on foreign aid and longstanding international alliances.
articles.title: Trump says he warned NATO ally: Spend more on defense or Russia can 'do whatever the hell they want'

articles.author: COLLEEN LONG
articles.description: WILMINGTON, Del. (AP) — First lady Jill Biden said in an email to campaign donors on Saturday she didn't know what the special counsel was trying to achieve when he suggested President Joe Biden could not remember his son's death.
articles.title: First lady questions whether special counsel referenced son's death to score political points

articles.author: MARIA SHERMAN and FOSTER KLUG
articles.description: LOS ANGELES (AP) — Will she make it in time? Intrepid flight trackers online seem to think so.On social media, fans of Taylor Swift and aviation journalists believe they've identified Swift's private jet, labeled “The Football Era." It arrived from Tokyo’s Haneda Airport to Los Angeles' LAX airport just after 3:30 p.m.
articles.title: Taylor Swift reaches LAX in journey from Tokyo to Super Bowl, online sleuths say. Will she make it?

articles.author: BASSEM MROUE and ABDULRAHMAN ZEYAD
articles.description: BEIRUT (AP) — An Israeli drone struck a car near Lebanon’s southern port city of Sidon on Saturday, killing at least two people and wounding two others, security officials said.The strike came as tensions across the Middle East grow with the Israel-Hamas war, a drone attack last month that killed three U.S.
articles.title: An Israeli drone strike in Lebanon kills 2 in one of the deepest hits inside the country in weeks

articles.author: SAMYA KULLAB
articles.description: KYIV, Ukraine (AP) — A Russian drone strike on Kharkiv, Ukraine's second largest city, killed seven people overnight, including three children, Kharkiv region governor Oleh Syniehubov reported Saturday.
articles.title: Russian drone strike on Kharkiv, Ukraine's 2nd largest city, kills 7

articles.author: MICHELLE L. PRICE, MEG KINNARD and JAMES POLLARD
articles.description: CONWAY, S.C. (AP) — With two weeks to go before the South Carolina Republican primary, Nikki Haley is challenging Donald Trump on her home turf while the former president is turning to his familiar playbook of personal attacks as he tries to quash his last major rival for the nomination.
articles.title: Haley challenges Trump on her home turf in South Carolina as the Republican primary looms

articles.description: SANTA FE, N.M. (AP) — A series of slow-moving winter storms that wreaked havoc in Southern California and left 3 feet (91 centimeters) of snow in northern Arizona made its way Saturday into New Mexico, where a stretch of U.S.
articles.title: Southwest winter storm moves into New Mexico; up to foot of snow possible in northeast mountains

articles.author: JUSTIN SPIKE
articles.description: BUDAPEST, Hungary (AP) — Hungary’s conservative president resigned Saturday amid public outcry over a pardon she granted to a man convicted as an accomplice in a child sexual abuse case, a decision that unleashed an unprecedented political scandal for the long-serving nationalist government.
articles.title: Hungary's president resigns over a pardon to a man convicted in a child sexual abuse case
